data.current_description: This endpoint returns all the Integrations for the user making this call.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all Integrations configured for the authenticated user. Returns a list of Integration objects containing integration IDs, types, destinations, and configuration details. Useful for discovering existing event forwarding configurations.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'ListIntegration' is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description lacks detail about what data is returned and the purpose of listing integrations. Enhanced version clarifies the action, authentication context, return structure, and use case for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'AddIntegration' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is a noun phrase lacking action clarity. Description mentions limits but omits input requirements, output structure, and authentication context. Improved version specifies the request schema, response structure, limits, and authentication requirements for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: This endpoint creates an Integration for email event forwarding. Each Integration has a maximum number of allowed Integration instances per user. For example, users can create up to 10 Segment Integrations.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new Integration to forward SendGrid email events to a third-party service. Accepts IntegrationInput containing integration type, destination, and configuration. Returns the created Integration object with assigned ID. Subject to per-user limits (e.g., maximum 10 Segment Integrations). Requires authentication and valid destination configuration.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a noun phrase lacking action clarity. Description mentions limits but omits input requirements, output structure, and authentication context. Improved version specifies the request schema, response structure, limits, and authentication requirements for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'DeleteIntegration' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary 'DeleteBulkIntegration' is misleading (suggests bulk deletion) and vague. Description is extremely minimal with no parameter details or side effect information. Enhanced version clarifies single-resource deletion, specifies the ID parameter requirement, explains the permanent nature of deletion, and describes the operational consequence (cessation of event forwarding).

data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specific Integration by its ID, stopping email event forwarding to the associated third-party service. Requires the integration ID as a path parameter. Returns success confirmation. This action is permanent and cannot be undone - the integration configuration will be removed and event forwarding will cease immediately.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'DeleteBulkIntegration' is misleading (suggests bulk deletion) and vague. Description is extremely minimal with no parameter details or side effect information. Enhanced version clarifies single-resource deletion, specifies the ID parameter requirement, explains the permanent nature of deletion, and describes the operational consequence (cessation of event forwarding).

data.current_description: This endpoint returns the data for a specific Integration.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific Integration using its ID. Requires the integration ID as a path parameter. Returns the Integration object containing type, destination, configuration, and status. Useful for verifying integration settings or retrieving configuration before updates.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'GetIntegration' is generic and lacks specificity about the ID parameter. Description is vague about what data is returned and the use case. message: Operation 'UpdateIntegration' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequately action-oriented. Description lacks critical details about PATCH semantics, parameter requirements, request/response schemas, and the immediate effect on event forwarding. Enhanced version clarifies partial update behavior, specifies both path and body parameters, explains the return value, and indicates operational side effects.

data.current_description: This endpoint updates an existing Integration.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing Integration using PATCH semantics, allowing partial modifications to configuration. Requires the integration ID as a path parameter and IntegrationPatch object containing fields to update. Returns the updated Integration object with all current settings. Only provided fields are modified; omitted fields retain their existing values. Changes take effect immediately for event forwarding.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequately action-oriented. Description lacks critical details about PATCH semantics, parameter requirements, request/response schemas, and the immediate effect on event forwarding. Enhanced version clarifies partial update behavior, specifies both path and body parameters, explains the return value, and indicates operational side effects.
